content: You are a highly accurate data extraction assistant. Your task is to extract the company name and job title from the provided job listing and return the data in JSON format.

Here is the job listing:

---
Senior Software Engineer - Healthcare Technology Platform

Company: MedTech Innovations
Location: San Francisco, CA (Remote/Hybrid)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description:

We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing healthcare technology team. You'll be working on mission-critical applications that serve healthcare providers and improve patient outcomes across the country.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design and develop scalable web applications using modern frameworks
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product, design, and DevOps
• Implement security best practices and ensure HIPAA compliance
• Optimize application performance and database queries
• Mentor junior developers and participate in code reviews
• Contribute to architectural decisions and technical roadmap planning
---

Please extract the company name and job title. Your response must be a valid JSON object with the keys 'company_name' and 'job_title'.

You are an experienced professional writing a cover letter. Write naturally and authentically, as if you're personally explaining your background to a hiring manager over coffee. Use varied sentence lengths, include contractions when natural (I've, I'm, that's, it's), and write with the subtle imperfections that make human writing authentic. Avoid overly polished or perfect prose. Be conversational yet professional, confident but not robotic.

Write a cover letter for this position. Keep it professional but natural—like a human would.

**Experience:** 5+ years in healthcare technology and fintech
**Current Status:** Available for new opportunities

**Job Description:**
Senior Software Engineer - Healthcare Technology Platform

Company: MedTech Innovations
Location: San Francisco, CA (Remote/Hybrid)

We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing healthcare technology team. You'll be working on mission-critical applications that serve healthcare providers and improve patient outcomes across the country.

Required Skills:
• 5+ years of professional software development experience
• Strong proficiency in Python and JavaScript
• Experience with React or Vue.js for frontend development
• Solid understanding of SQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL)
• Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
• Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
• Understanding of API design and RESTful services
• Healthcare industry experience and HIPAA compliance knowledge preferred

Dear Hiring Manager,

I'm writing to express my interest in the Senior Software Engineer position at MedTech Innovations. With over 5 years of experience building scalable applications in healthcare technology, I'm excited about the opportunity to contribute to mission-critical systems that improve patient outcomes.

My background aligns well with your requirements. I've spent the last few years developing full-stack applications using Python and JavaScript, with extensive experience in React for frontend development and Node.js for backend services. I'm comfortable working with PostgreSQL databases and have experience optimizing queries for performance at scale.

What particularly draws me to this role is the healthcare focus. In my previous position at TechHealth Solutions, I led development of a HIPAA-compliant patient management system serving 500K+ patients. I understand the unique challenges of healthcare technology—the need for absolute reliability, security, and compliance while maintaining excellent user experience for both providers and patients.

I have solid experience with AWS cloud services including EC2, S3, Lambda, and RDS, along with containerization using Docker and Kubernetes for deployment and scaling. I've also worked extensively with RESTful API design and microservices architecture, which I see are important for your platform.

I'd be grateful for the opportunity to discuss how my healthcare technology experience and technical skills could contribute to your team's mission.

Best regards,
Alex Developer
